survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for E-Commerce Platforms
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their satisfaction levels with various aspects of their e-commerce shopping experience, including website usability, product selection, and customer service.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop online?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall shopping experience on your preferred e-commerce platform?
